name: Geo-memo-try
description:
TUTORIAL

Hold the cylinder to start playing the game. It will show a pattern with blue color on the small gray boxes surrounding each colored figure,  after the pattern is completed click in the right order to add points to your score. 

Press R to restart the game and get a better score than your friends!

DESCRIPTION

Is your brain's capacity to remember everything to win? Do you think your hand can follow these puzzles? If so, come and have some fun with this game based on "Simon says".

You'll have several puzzles at the same time showing you different patterns that you'll need to complete. Follow the correct pattern, and beat your friends by being faster than them!

Add your score to the comments and show you are the BEST in this game.
